transforms.code:
rosters = system.roster.getRosters()
	rosterArray = []
	
	for roster in rosters:
		value = roster
		label = roster
		rosterArray.append({"value":value, "label":label})
	
	return rosterArray

userSource = value.userSource
	
	if userSource:
		users = system.user.getUsers(userSource)
		if users:
			# Loops through the users stored on Gateway based on the user source and create a list of user objects.
			roles = ["GroupSCADAIgnitionOperators","GroupSCADAIgnitionMaintenance"]
			userArray = []
			for user in users:
				userRoles = user.getRoles()
				if any([role in userRoles for role in roles]):
					username    = user.get("username")
					firstName   = user.get("firstname") if user.get("firstname") else ""
					lastName    = user.get("lastname") if user.get("lastname") else ""
					contactInfo = user.getContactInfo() if user.getContactInfo() else []
					source      = userSource
					userArray.append({"username":username, "firstName":firstName, "lastName":lastName, "contactInfo":contactInfo, "errorMessage":"", "userSource":source})
			userArray.sort(key=lambda x:x["username"].lower())
			return userArray
			
		# No Users exist if the object returns for the user source is empty.
		else:
			return [{"username": "No Users Exist", "errorMessage": "No Users Exist"}]

	# User source not valid if a user source does not exist in the incoming param.
	else:
		return [{"username": "No User Source", "errorMessage": "No User Source"}]

rosterNameError = value["rosterNameError"]
	availableUsers  = value["availableUsers"]
	
	errorMessage  = []
	
	# Check if roster name has errors.
	if rosterNameError:	
		errorMessage.append({"errorMessage": rosterNameError, "errorLocation": "rosterName"})

	# If a user source doesn't exist or there are no available users
	# in the user source, return the error. Else, return ""
	if availableUsers["errorMessage"]:
		errorMessage.append({"errorMessage": availableUsers["errorMessage"], "errorLocation":"userSource"})
	
	return errorMessage

currentRoster = value.currentRoster
	userSource   = value.userSource
	
	# If rosterAction is "edit" get users that exist in roster. Else, display "No On-Call Users Exist".
	if currentRoster:
		users = system.roster.getRoster(currentRoster).getUsers()
				
		# If currentRoster has users, create a list of user object attributes.
		if users:
			userArray = []
			for user in users:
				userSource   = user.getPath().getPathComponent('usr-prov')
				username     = user.getPath().getPathComponent('usr')
				userInfo     = system.user.getUser(userSource, username)
				if userInfo:
					firstName    = userInfo.get("firstName") if userInfo.get("firstName") is not None else ""
					lastName     = userInfo.get("lastName") if userInfo.get("lastName") is not None else ""
					contactInfo  = userInfo.getContactInfo()
					userArray.append({"username":username, "firstName":firstName, "lastName":lastName, "contactInfo":contactInfo, "userSource": userSource, "errorMessage": ""})
			return userArray		
		else:
			return [{"username": "No On-Call Users Exist", "errorMessage": "No On-Call Users Exist"}]
	else:
		return [{"username": "No On-Call Users Exist", "errorMessage": "No On-Call Users Exist"}]

props.text: Site Paging Disable Notification Time (Note: notification may be delayed by up to 10 minutes):

config.script:
currentRoster = self.view.custom.currentRoster
	userSource   = self.view.params.userSource
	currentUsers  = system.roster.getRoster(currentRoster).getUsers()
	onCallUsers   = self.parent.parent.getChild("Users and Rosters").getChild("On Call Users Container").getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
					
	# If the roster being modified has users, remove all the users before adding the new list.						
	if currentUsers:
		userArray = []
		checkDuplicates = []
		for user in currentUsers:
			userSource = user.getPath().getPathComponent('usr-prov')
			username   = user.getPath().getPathComponent('usr')
			userObj    = system.user.getUser(userSource, username)
			
			# Create an exclusive list of all users in roster. Cannot have duplicates.
			if userObj and {"userSource":userSource, "username":username} not in checkDuplicates:
				userArray.append(userObj)
				checkDuplicates.append({"userSource":userSource, "username":username})
				
		if userArray:
			system.roster.removeUsers(currentRoster, userArray)
			
	# If the first onCallUsers index has an empty string for errorMessage, there are no errors.
	if onCallUsers[0]["errorMessage"] == "":
		# Create a list of the user objects from the new list of users for the On-Call Roster and add them to current roster.
		newUserArray = []
		for user in onCallUsers:
			userSource = user["userSource"]
			username   = user["username"]
			userInfo = system.user.getUser(userSource, username)
			if userInfo:
				newUserArray.append(userInfo)
		system.roster.addUsers(currentRoster, newUserArray)

transforms.code: return {"data":value}

config.script:
rowSelected    = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Available Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
	availableUsers = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Available Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	onCallUsers   = self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users Container").getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	
	# If onCallUsers has an errorMessage for no users existing, pop the error and add user.
	if rowSelected is not None:
		if onCallUsers[0]["errorMessage"] != "":
			onCallUsers.pop()
		onCallUsers.append(availableUsers[rowSelected])

onCallUsers = self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users Container").getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	availableUsers = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Available Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	
	# Do not add all users if available users contains an errorMessage instead of users.
	# Else, pop the errorMessage on onCallUsers if there are no users currently and add all users from Available Users list.
	if availableUsers[0]["errorMessage"] != "":
		return
	else:
		if onCallUsers[0]["errorMessage"] != "":
			onCallUsers.pop()

		concatList = onCallUsers + availableUsers
		self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users Container").getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data = concatList

transforms.code: return {"data":value}
return value if value is not None else [{"firstName": "No On-Call Users Exist"}]

config.script:
roster = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	rowSelected = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
	enabled = self.custom.iconEnabled
	
	# If enabled, pop the last object in array and insert as the first indice in the same array.
	if enabled:
		roster.insert(0, roster.pop(rowSelected))
		self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow = 0

config.expression: if ({.../On Call Users/Table.props.selection.selectedRow}!=null & {.../On Call Users/Table.props.data}!=null, True, False)

config.script:
roster = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	rowSelected = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
	enabled = self.custom.iconEnabled
	
	# If enabled, insert popped object one indice up in the same array.
	if enabled:
		roster.insert(rowSelected-1, roster.pop(rowSelected))
		self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow -= 1

config.expression: if ({.../On Call Users/Table.props.selection.selectedRow}!=null & {.../On Call Users/Table.props.data}!=null, True, False)

config.script:
roster = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	rowSelected = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
	enabled = self.custom.iconEnabled
	
	# If enabled, insert popped object one indice down in the array.
	if enabled:
		roster.insert(rowSelected+1, roster.pop(rowSelected))
		self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow += 1

config.expression: if ({.../On Call Users/Table.props.selection.selectedRow}!=null & {.../On Call Users/Table.props.data}!=null, True, False)

customMethods.name: editRoster

config.script:
roster = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	rowSelected = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
	enabled = self.custom.iconEnabled
	
	# If enabled, selected object in roster list and append to the end of list.
	if enabled:
		roster.insert(len(roster)-1, roster.pop(rowSelected))
		self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow = len(roster)-1

config.expression: if ({.../On Call Users/Table.props.selection.selectedRow}!=null & {.../On Call Users/Table.props.data}!=null, True, False)

config.script:
onCallRoster = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data
	rowSelected = self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow
	enabled = self.custom.iconEnabled
	
	# If enabled and users exist in table, pop the selected row.
	if enabled and onCallRoster[0]["username"] != "No On-Call Users Exist":
		onCallRoster.pop(rowSelected)
		# Deselect the row deleted.
		self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.selection.selectedRow = None
		if len(onCallRoster) == 0:
			self.parent.parent.getChild("On Call Users").getChild("Table").props.data = [{"username": "No On-Call Users Exist", "errorMessage": "No On-Call Users Exist"}]

config.expression: if({.../On Call Users/Table.props.data}=null, "#5A5A5A", if({.../On Call Users/Table.props.selection.selectedRow}!=null, True, False))
